attributes.action: Make it illegal to publish online material promoting anorexia/bulimia/self-harm
attributes.additional_details:
Too many children nowadays are so worried about their weight it’s disgusting, websites should be held accountable for the way their content promotes self-harm and eating disorders.

Protecting young people from online adult content is one thing, but continuing to promote self-harm, anorexia and bulimia is just as bad.

I believe any website or blog that promotes these things whether Facebook, tumblr, Twitter, Instagram should be held accountable by a new law.
attributes.background: As someone who has seen friends struggle with eating disorders, it is horrible to see how easy it is to find pro Ana blogs and diets on tumblr and other websites. I think it should be illegal for websites to publish material that promotes self-harming and eating disorders.
